original_text: Then mount four rows of precious stones on it. The first row shall be carnelian, chrysolite and beryl;
korean_text: 그것에 네 줄로 보석을 물리되 첫 줄은 홍보석 황옥 녹주옥이요

sentences.original_text: Then mount four rows of precious stones on it.
sentences.korean_translation: 그 위에 보석 네 줄을 장식하라.

sentences.original_text: The first row shall be carnelian,
